title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 246 - MERCURY REDUCTION PROGRAM FOR COAL-FIRED ELECTRIC UTILITY STEAM GENERATING UNITS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 246 - MERCURY REDUCTION PROGRAM FOR COAL-FIRED ELECTRIC UTILITY STEAM GENERATING UNITS
State Regulations
§ 246.1 - Definitions
§ 246.2 - Applicability
§ 246.3 - Standard requirements
§ 246.4 - Mercury reduction program permit requirements
§ 246.5 - Mercury Reduction Program facility-wide emission limits for existing units
§ 246.6 - Mercury reduction program unit limits for new and existing units
§ 246.7 - Monitoring and reporting
§ 246.8 - Initial monitoring certification and recertification procedures
§ 246.9 - Missing data procedures and out of control periods for continuous monitoring systems
§ 246.10 - Notifications
§ 246.11 - Recordkeeping and reporting
§ 246.12 - Petitions
§ 246.13 - Additional requirements to provide heat input data
§ 246.14 - Severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 246

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0311

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
